thread.title: 27 Tips And Products For Anyone Obsessed With French Fries
thread.title_full: 27 Tips And Products For Anyone Obsessed With French Fries

author: Maitland Quitmeyer, Treye Green
title: 27 Tips And Products For Anyone Obsessed With French Fries
text:
View this image ›
Alice Mongkongllite / BuzzFeed We hope you love the products we recommend! Just so you know, BuzzFeed may collect a share of sales from the links on this page.
ID: 10547671 1. Carry your fry money in a bad ass shoulder bag that will have your friends more than salty about your purse game. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $10.79 .
ID: 10571257 2. Try a French fry nacho recipe — like this one piled high with chorizo — and never look at a tortilla chip again. View this image ›
foodnessgracious.com Fries > chips. (Or chips > crisps for all you Brits out there).
Check out the recipe here .
ID: 10547701 3. Cut out the grease with an air fryer that makes magically crispy fries with little to no oil. amazon.com
amazon.com
 It cooks fries, wings, potato chips, or any fried food with convection heating — creating the perfect crunch without a deep fryer or tons of oil.
Get it from Amazon for $94.99 .
ID: 10547696 4. Fill up your condiment gun to dress up your fries in the baddest way. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $12.63 .
ID: 10571260 5. Bake in a perforated pan that actually crisps your potato or veggie fries to perfection. View this image ›
amazon.com It evenly circulates heat, so even those oven-baked fries taste like the real deal — plus you don’t even have to turn them over during baking!
Get it from Amazon for $12.33 .
ID: 10575832 6. Dip your taters in style with a two-in-one cone that keeps your ketchup or mayo properly separated. View this image ›
amazon.com You’re obv not one of those fools who drizzles ketchup all over their basket of fries.
Get it from Amazon for $4.99 (if this one sells out, you can get a similar one here or here ).
ID: 10547680 7. Bring the sweet potatoes in on the fun with a recipe that makes ~healthy-ish~ baked fries with a crunch (the secret is corn starch!). View this image ›
layersofhappiness.com Check out the recipe here .
ID: 10547850 8. Transform your cup holder into a fry holder with an attachment that fits all standard fry cartons. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $5.19 .
ID: 10547900 9. Squeezed a ~supersized~ plushie when the cravings are strong but you don’t want to leave your bed. View this image ›
amazon.com Get them from Amazon for $29.35 .
ID: 10547866 10. Immerse yourself in delicious history with a book that illustrates how fries were first created, their ties to culture, and serves as a guide to all the shapes and varieties. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $11.30 (hardcover) or $9.99 (Kindle).
ID: 10547883 11. Tote around a leak-resistant cosmetics bag to reveal the secret behind your amazing glow. View this image ›
etsy.com Get it from Bayside Barb on Etsy for $19.95 .
ID: 10571250 12. Stock your kitchen with a giant jug of Heinz for anyone who likes a little fry with their ketchup. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $5.82 .
ID: 10575763 13. Clip on a gold keychain to let everyone know what comes first in your life. View this image ›
shopspring.com Get it from Spring for $16 .
ID: 10571378 14. Snatch up a fries pen that will be the most mouthwatering writing tool you’ll ever own. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $5.41 or Jet for $6.85 .
ID: 10571319 15. Stop letting limp leftover fries get you down — reheat them in a handy panini press to give them new life. View this image ›
amazon.com Lol, what even are leftover fries tho?
Check out a list of all the ways you’re reheating your leftovers wrong here .
Get this panini press from Amazon for $24.94 .
ID: 10547735 16. Expand your cooking skills with a recipe book full of over 50 french fry recipes you can use for any meal! amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $9.99 .
ID: 10571252 17. Invest in set of printed bags to take your at-home fry presentation to another level. View this image ›
etsy.com Get a pack of 50 bags from All 4 Parties on Etsy for $5 .
ID: 10571248 18. Slip on a vibrant hat so you can rep #TeamFrenchFries with pride. View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $11.25 .
ID: 10571256 19. Upgrade your phone with an adorable hotdog and fries iPhone case or an equally fierce “Feed Me. I’m Yours” case. casetify.com , casetify.com Get them from Casetify: Hot Dog and Fries case for $40 and “Feed Me I’m Yours” for $40.
ID: 10571264 20. Dip I dip you dip I dip in ~fry sauce~, which may make you rethink your previous condiment choices. View this image ›
onegoodthingbyjillee.com A Utah staple.
Check out the recipe here .
ID: 10547702 21. Make every day feel like Fryday by wearing a tee that knows your heart’s desire. View this image ›
amazon.com Way better than days of the week shirts.
Get it from Amazon for $12.25 .
ID: 10575691 22. Slice in style with a stainless steel tool that makes easy work of turning potatoes into fries. View this image ›
amazon.com It’ll also slice your apples or mangos into wedges, but who cares?
Get it from Amazon for $14.97 .
ID: 10547692 23. Put your fries obsession on full display with a colorful silicon case View this image ›
amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $10.99 .
ID: 10571388 24. Trade in your salt for a set of french fry seasonings that’ll give your favorite snack an extra kick of flavor. View this image ›
amazon.com Get the set of five from Amazon for $17.95 .
ID: 10571267 25. Become a fry-making legend with two-basket deep fryer with an adjustable temperature gauge. amazon.com Get it from Amazon for $47.09+ .
ID: 10571322 26. Up the taste level of any outfit with a pair of fries socks that are made for a trendsetter. etsy.com Get them from Pyknic Official on Etsy for $14 .
ID: 10571354 27. Power up your phone on the go with a portable battery that looks just like the food that powers YOU. View this image ›
wattzuppower.com My energy level is at 8% — get me some fries STAT!
Get it from Wattz Up Power or Amazon for $24.99.
ID: 10575801 Live your truth, guys. View this image ›
Disney ID: 10583926 Do you have half an hour to help us out? View this image ›
CBS We love helping BuzzFeed readers find the best gifts, products, and gadgets around — but we need your help to make shopping with BuzzFeed the best experience possible! We’re looking for volunteers to talk with us about their shopping habits and how BuzzFeed can make your shopping experience even better. It will only take 30 minutes, and you can do it from wherever you’re located!
If you’re interested in helping us out, please send us your contact information here. Thanks, and happy shopping!
ID: 10636505 Want even more great product suggestions? Sign up for BuzzFeed’s Gift Guide Newsletter!
View this embed ›
